body:
Comment 10: 
If a program explicitly imports a main package, then the types that it imports are not
the same as the types when the main program runs by itself.

I think you are operating under a misconception, but I'm not sure quite what it is. 
When you import a package, the path string used in the import statement is, by
definition, the package path.  If you import the same package using two different path
strings, you get two different packages.  The same applies to importing main.  There is
the main package that runs the program, and there is the imported main package.  They
are two different packages.
